thawa da: machcha jathakayehi mas raja wa upanna wu mage bodhisaththwayo gharhakalayehi diya sindi karmabalayen miya yannawu boho nayan daka indunil mini sangalak se itha pra sanna wu thamandage asdeka dalwa aakashaya bala:abhithathanaya pajjunna- nidhin kakassa nasaya, kakan sokaya randhehi- machcha soka pamochaya-yi.yana me wisithuru gayin sathyikri ya kalaseka.

wanajiwi ha gowijana sewa amathi es.em. chandrasena, hitapu maha amathi barti premalal disanayaka, hitapu palath sabha manthri es.em. ranjith yana mahathwaru da mehi sitithi.jathika sawiya gama nanguma yatathe da siyalu gammana wala maha marga, praja sanwardhana, manawa sanwardhana, adhyathmika sanwardhana wadasatahan kriyathmaka wiya. 2011 wasare ee sandaha rupiyal miliyana 7740 k waya kala bawa aarthika katayuthu amathyanshaya penwa deyi.
